  • FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions about Razominer

Discover everything you need to know about Razominer—our all-in-one client generation engine. From how it works to its benefits and features, find answers to your most common questions below

Whatsapp Instagram Phone-alt
What is Razominer?

  • Razominer is a comprehensive client generation engine that combines lead extraction, data refinement, and automated outreach methods to enhance your client acquisition process.

How does Razominer help with lead generation?

Razominer extracts high-quality leads from multiple sources, refines the data, and uses automated tools for outreach, including WhatsApp, email, and social media.

How quickly can I expect to see results with Razominer?

You’ll start seeing results right after setup, with appointments typically starting to come in within one week.

What kind of data does Razominer extract?

Razominer extracts data such as phone numbers, email addresses, social media links, business names, and more.

Is there any support available during setup?

Yes, we provide detailed setup tutorials and offer live support to assist you through the installation and initial setup.

How does WhatsApp automation work with Razominer?

WhatsApp automation allows you to send personalized messages to leads, automate follow-ups, and manage interactions efficiently.

Ready to get started?

Ready to see Razominer in action? Book a live demo to explore how our client generation engine can transform your lead acquisition and outreach strategies.

We’ll walk you through the features, answer your questions, and show you how to get the most out of Razominer. Schedule your demo today

contact us
